text: Salim Khan (born 24 November 1935) is an Indian actor and screenwriter. He starred mostly in Hindi movies. Khan is known for his role in Teesri Manzil (1966). He is married to veteran Indian actress Helen. He is the father of actor Salman Khan. Khan was born in Indore, Central Provinces and Berar, India. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian screenwriters
title: Salim Khan
